dict.string: Toggle the visibility of hidden files

on alfred_script(q) set v to do shell script "echo $(defaults read com.apple.finder AppleShowAllFiles)" if v is "True" then do shell script "defaults write com.apple.finder AppleShowAllFiles FALSE" else do shell script "defaults write com.apple.finder AppleShowAllFiles TRUE" end if do shell script "killall Finder" tell application "System Events" to set frontmost of process "Finder" to true end alfred_script

#!/bin/sh # Script by Subject22 (http://www.alfredforum.com/user/3857-subject22)
#check the current value and display the result as subtitle CURVALUE=$(defaults read com.apple.finder AppleShowAllFiles -bool)
if [ $CURVALUE = 0 ] || [ $CURVALUE = "FALSE" ]; then icon="icon-filled.png" title="Show Hidden Files" subtitle="Hidden files are currently invisible" else icon="icon-faded.png" title="Hide Hidden Files" subtitle="Hidden files are currently visible" fi
echo '<?xml version="1.0"?><items>' echo "<item arg=\"{query}\" uid=\"ssid\" valid=\"yes\">" echo "<title>$title</title>" echo "<subtitle>$subtitle</subtitle>" echo "<icon>$icon</icon></item></items>" echo "</items>"
Type out 'hidden' to see the status of hidden files
Immediately toggle the visibility of hidden files

USAGE:
‚hidden’ to see status of hidden files before changing
‚togglehidden‘ to immediately change the visibility of hidden files
